about_the_game:
Kosmocean, a planet covered by water, were human survive on tiny islands, and factions lay spread across the sea. Veredis, that bordered on a pastoral lands, Utopia with its ancient steel Submarines, Noun Cult and its Firetop Mountain.

You are Ikki, a young boy living on a small island with his intrepid grandfather who taught him everything he knows. Together they built Bathys, a pocket submarine, using recyled material, flotsom and jetsom.




After a catastrophe with an unknown cause, our heros, Ikki and his grandfather are separated. All that is left is the incomplete logbook.

Through the game puzzles, bullet-hell sequences, and skill-based challenges, will reveal the lost scattered pages of the journal. Ikki will be plunged miles and miles into the depths where the sun never shines. His journey will take him to the blue Abyss of uncharted waters of the Pole all the way back to their own origins and onward to the revelation of his grandfather's closely guarded secret.
Where the ocean seems to have no bottom, a new world beneath the sea may hold the key to the survival of humanity...

You will discover a detailed water world brought to life with hand-drawn animated graphics and immersive sound design.

name: Kosmocean - The Endless Sea
short_description: Adventure and submarine exploration game. Control your Bathyscaphe with the help of a logbook. Through the game puzzles, bullet-hell sequences, and skill-based challenges, you will be plunged miles and miles into the depths where the ocean seems to have no end.
